Validation examples with external 3rd party addons

Wiki - 3rd Party Addons

ERRORS!

  • {{ item.friendlyName != '' ? item.friendlyName : item.field }}: {{item.message}}
<valid-array-require-how-many="one">
<valid-array-require-how-many="all">
We can validate an input array by 2 ways:
  1. <valid-array-require-how-many="one"> (default), if 1 value is found as valid, the complete input set is Valid.
  2. <valid-array-require-how-many="all">. For the input to be Valid, we need "all" array values to be valid.
